scripts.build: npm run build_spring_boot && npm run build_micronaut && npm run build_quarkus
scripts.build_native: npm run build_micronaut_native && npm run build_quarkus_native
scripts.build_spring_boot: cd spring-example && ./mvnw clean package && cp target/springboot.jar ..
scripts.build_micronaut: cd micronaut-example && ./mvnw clean package && cp target/micronaut.jar ..
scripts.build_quarkus: cd quarkus-example && ./mvnw clean package && cp target/quarkus-runner.jar ..
scripts.build_micronaut_native: cd micronaut-example && ./mvnw clean package && cd target && native-image --no-server -cp micronaut.jar && cp micronaut ../..
scripts.build_quarkus_native: cd quarkus-example && ./mvnw clean package -Pnative && cp target/quarkus-runner ..
scripts.time: npm run time_spring_boot && npm run time_micronaut && npm run time_quarkus && npm run time_micronaut_native && npm run time_quarkus_native
